name: Kingdom of Loafing
description:
Kingdom of Loafing 0.0.1

29/10/2020

by John aka Magehound

Made in Godot

Instructions: 
Just extract and run the exe, nothing else required.

Click on points of interest to visit them.

Click the button on the right-hand side to access the
status menu.

Known issues:

Dev level up button isn't tied to exp, so will brea
exp gain.

Issue / wishlist reporting:
